name: organism
title: Organism
description: A particular organism or defined group of organisms considered to be taxonomically homogeneous.

fields.name: organismID
fields.description: An identifier for a particular instance of an Organism.

fields.name: organismScope
fields.description: A description of the kind of dwc:Organism instance. Can be used to indicate whether the dwc:Organism instance represents a discrete organism or if it represents a particular type of aggregation.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: organismName
fields.description: A textual name or label assigned to a dwc:Organism instance.

fields.name: organismRemarks
fields.description: Comments or notes about the Organism.

fields.name: verbatimIdentification
fields.description: A string representing the taxonomic identification as it appeared in the original record.

fields.name: scientificName
fields.description: The full scientific name, with authorship and date information if known. When forming part of an Identification, this should be the name in lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined. This term should not contain identification qualifications, which should instead be supplied in the verbatimIdentification term.

fields.name: scientificName
fields.description: The full scientific name of the kingdom in which the scientificName is classified.

fields.name: taxonRank
fields.description: The taxonomic rank of the most specific name in the scientificName.
